transArray.content: The hotel bathroom is designed to separate dry and wet areas very conveniently. The mirror also has a light filling function. The hot water temperature in the room is also very suitable. The bedding is very comfortable to sleep on and the mattress is also very soft. The staff will take the initiative to say hello when you enter! Very good experience
Hello dear guests, I hope that Xiaohan can sweep away the dust in your life. When I look up, I see eyes full of stars. I love you, little man.
